      public SlashCommandHandler()

  • Method Details

    • onButtonClick

      public void onButtonClick​(@NotNull @NotNull net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.ButtonClickEvent event)
      This class extends the ListenerAdapter, so this method is automatically called from the discord api. This method especially is getting called whenever a user has pressed any button. The according slashCommand is received from the ButtonManager and the event is passed to the SlashCommand.clicked(ButtonClickEvent, boolean) method.
      Overrides:
      onButtonClick in class net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      Parameters:
      event - the button click event data

    • onSelectionMenu

      public void onSelectionMenu​(@NotNull @NotNull net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.SelectionMenuEvent event)
      This class extends the ListenerAdapter, so this method is automatically called from the discord api. This method especially is getting called whenever a user has made an action with any SelectionMenu. The according slashCommand is received from the DropdownManager and the event is passed to the SlashCommand.dropdown(SelectionMenuEvent, boolean) method.
      Overrides:
      onSelectionMenu in class net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      Parameters:
      event - the selection menu event data

    • onSlashCommand

      public void onSlashCommand​(@NotNull @NotNull net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.SlashCommandEvent event)
      This class extends the ListenerAdapter, so this method is automatically called from the discord api. This method especially is getting called whenever a user has entered a slash command. The event data is passed to the correct SlashCommand.execute(SlashCommandEvent) method.
      Overrides:
      onSlashCommand in class net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      Parameters:
      event - the slash command event data
